pkgmetadata.longdescription: The klarf-reader library is a python 3 lib that allow to parse and get klarf content as dataclass.## Installing Karf-ReaderTo install klarf-reader, if you already have Python, you can install with:```pip install klarf-reader```## How to import Karf-ReaderTo access klarf-reader and its functions import it in your Python code like this:```from klarf_reader.klarf import Klarf```## Reading the example codeTo reader a klarf file you just have to give the klarf path and klarf-reader will return you an instance of KlarfContent that contains information from klarf file.```path = Path('wd') / 'my_klarf_file'content = Klarf.load_from_file(filepath=path)```You can also get raw contents from file.```path = Path('wd') / 'my_klarf_file'content, raw_content = Klarf.load_from_file_with_raw_content(filepath=path)```
